meanings.sent1: The music was pulsing through the speakers.
meanings.sent2: Her heart was pulsing with excitement.
meanings.sent3: The dance floor was pulsing with energy.
meanings.sent4: The city pulsing with life even at night.
meanings.sent5: The colors of the painting seemed to pulse with each brushstroke.

meanings.sent1: I felt a pulsing in my temples.
meanings.sent2: The pulsing of the drum echoed through the room.
meanings.sent3: The pulsing of the light made the room feel alive.
meanings.sent4: The pulsing of the waves against the shore was calming.
meanings.sent5: The pulsing of the engine signaled the start of the race.
